snippet: The company plans to add lightweight carbon-composite wings and new engines to the popular 777 model.
abstract: Boeing is likely to seek approval from its board as early as April 2013 to start taking orders for an updated version of its 777 passenger jet.
lead_paragraph: The company plans to add lightweight carbon-composite wings and new engines to the popular 777 model.

headline.main: Boeing Seeks Approval for Updated Jet
headline.print_headline: Boeing Seeks Approval for Updated Jet
